scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.build-all: npm run install-all && cd client && npm run build:prod
scripts.build-all:clean: rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && cd server && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && cd ../client && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm run install-all && cd client && npm run build:prod
